cleaned_text: Tennessee Center of Integrated Medicine We treat the whole body, so you can have a whole life Tennessee Center of Integrated Medicine Welcome to Tennessee Center of Integrated Medicine. We are located in Clarksville, TN. We are a multidisciplinary clinic able to treat many healthcare needs for Clarksville and surrounding areas. We provide chiropractic care, acupuncture, physical therapy, occupational therapy, functional medicine, and primary care medicine. At Tennessee Center of Integrated Medicine, we believe healthcare is better together. YOUR COMPLETE INTEGRATIVE MEDICAL PLAN We provide effective conservative health solutions that are designed just for you. We use evidence-based treatment plans to create a customized plan for you to effectively restore true health. DO YOU SUFFER FROM CHRONIC PAIN? Chronic Pain Clarksville TN About 56 Million Americans today suffer from the effects of chronic pain. That's about 20% of all the adults in the United States, and the numbers continue to rise. If you are experiencing chronic pain brought on by stress, medical conditions, or even from an accident, our friendly staff is ready to help you any way they can. What's unfortunate for most people is that their pain could be relieved. They just don't know where to turn for help and many unfortunate people go untreated. Tennessee Center of Integrated Medicine is dedicated to helping you relieve your pain. We offer the best approach to pain relief and injury recovery through non-surgical approaches. We are committed to providing you with the best in health care techniques and technologies for an individualized approach to your health and well-being. FINDING A PROVIDER The truth today is that the majority of chronic pain patients can be helped. The difficulty is finding a provider that you can turn to for help. Our clinic has multiple options available to fit the many different problems that exist. This problem effects people of all ages, but the greatest concentration is people between the ages of 30 and 50. We offer services including: Medical Services, Functional Medicine, Occupational Therapy, Physical Therapy, Chiropractic Care, Acupuncture, and Deep Tissue Laser Therapy. WHY OUR APPROACH IS DIFFERENT At Tennessee Center of Integrated Medicine we offer an array of services not found in most healthcare settings. Our ability to offer the best in medical and alternative treatments in one location means that our patients have more options. Our team will work with you to develop a treatment plan that makes sense for you. Make today be the day that you change your life and your health. Schedule a free consultation today with our team so that we can get a better understanding of your needs. We will work with you one on one to help you overcome the pain you are experiencing. Are you tired of feeling the way you're feeling? At Tennessee Center of Integrated Medicine our team is ready to meet with you to discuss your needs. We will help to design a program that is right for you. We look forward to meeting you.
